name: Enchanted Forest Stories
description:
Enchanted Forest Stories loosely follows the storyline of the TV series Once Upon a Time and Brothers Grimm fairytale characters by adding in new scenes to make the game more action-oriented, as well as changing the affiliation of the main villains. The story follows Princess Xenia as she embarks on a quest to become the crowned protector of the Enchanted Forest.  Each level is a different quest and different realm with the goal of defeating an evil wizard Baltimore and being named the protector of the Enchanted Forest.

Key Features

  • Vast open areas
  • Unique enemy encounters
  • Difficult bosses that need to be defeated
  • A memorable cast of characters
